gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: The data used in this study were produced by the MISR Science Team;processed/stored at the Langley DAAC;Product is the MISR Level 3 Global Cloud public Product in netCDF format covering a quarter;See ProductionDateTime for Published date.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This file contains the MISR Level 3 Global Cloud public Product in netCDF format covering a quarter (seasonal) Version Description: This version was created for the public data produced by MISR Level 3 PGEs.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This file contains the global cloud public product binned in netCDF format covering a quarter's (seasonal) products
